content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An important part of Outlook customization is the ability to filter and sort the incoming mail in dependence from the priority, importance or relation to one issue/service or another. Working with email in a mode that enables quick response, encourages effective workflow, facilitates elaboration and tracking is one of the primary aims of a service provider.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Outlook can evaluate incoming or outgoing e-mail messages and take various actions with them based on sets of instructions that are set up, called\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"rules\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Rules can be created based on different message criteria such as the message sender, message recipients, message content, attachments, and importance. By using rules, one can have Outlook automatically move, copy, delete, forward, redirect, reply to, or otherwise process messages based on the criteria specified. Rule can be chosen from a collection of standard rules or created on one's own from scratch.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If one has an Exchange account, rules can be set up in a way that they're applied to messages as they are received or processed by the Exchange server, and you can set up rules that go into effect only when you indicate that you are unavailable, by setting up an Automatic Reply. Whether or not you have an Exchange account, you can set up rules that are applied to messages stored on your computer.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There is no need to create rules manually\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Curator can share Outlook rules with newcomer
